What are the symptoms of Multisystemic smooth muscle dysfunction syndrome ?,"What are the signs and symptoms of Multisystemic smooth muscle dysfunction syndrome? Symptoms for people with multisystemic smooth muscle dysfunction syndrome can include the following : Congenital mydriasis (fixed dilated pupils) Patent Ductus Arteriosus Vascular problems including aneurysms Gastrintestinal problems Wea
